name: How ZK and Cryptography Enables IRL Communities
description: While most of my experience centers around community building, I'd ideally like to focus this talk around the value ZK tech can bring to community building. This will show more of the real world value and use cases like ZuPass and ZuStamps for helping enable privacy, freedom of speech and more active engagement within communities.

speakers.name: Janine Leger
speakers.bio: I'm Janine Leger, a co-creator at Zuzalu and a Gitcoin Steward. Iâ€™m stoked about using cryptography and ZK Tech, novel funding mechanisms, social infrastructure and incentive design within crypto to construct a future where IRL communities thrive.
